sqlMap.select: SELECT i.NOTICE_ID, i.NOTICE_TITLE, i.NOTICE_CONTENT, i.STATE, DATE_FORMAT(i.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS CREATE_TIME FROM T_USER_NOTICE i ORDER BY i.CREATE_TIME
SELECT i.NOTICE_ID, i.NOTICE_TITLE, i.NOTICE_CONTENT, i.STATE, DATE_FORMAT(i.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS CREATE_TIME FROM T_USER_NOTICE i WHERE i.NOTICE_ID = #noticeId#
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(NOTICE_ID+1), 0) AS NOTICE_ID FROM T_USER_NOTICE
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO T_USER_NOTICE(NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, STATE) VALUES(#noticeId#, #noticeTitle#, #noticeContent#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #state#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_USER_NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #noticeTitle#, NOTICE_CONTENT = #noticeContent# WHERE NOTICE_ID = #noticeId#
